frontmatter.description: I wanted to dive into the fundamentals of collaborative filtering and recommender systems, so I implemented a few common methods and compared them.
frontmatter.title: Comparing Collaborative Filtering Methods

frontmatter.description: I built a D3 map showing baby name popularity by state with an interactive time slider you can use to see how the popularity changes over time. Come check it out!
frontmatter.title: Interactive D3 Map of Baby Name Popularity

frontmatter.description: In my polymer field theory research, often my studies involve running a bunch of simulations where I pick one or more input parameters and change them over a range of values, then compare the results of each separate simulation to see how that/those variable(s) affect the system Iâ€™m simulating. It can be very tedious to manually create input files for each job, so I wrote a bash script to help me out.
frontmatter.title: Parameter Sweep Bash Script
